summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East Marginal Way, from Spokane Street to approximately 95 feet south of Diagonal Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14960 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
